rules_text:
Fangu {1{B}G} [i](You may cast this spell by paying its fangu cost and sacrificing a creature.)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, put casualty counters on Henmo's Wake equal to the number of creatures that died this turn. You gain that much life.
{BG}, Sacrifice Henmo's Wake: Create a 1/1 white and red Soldier creature token for each casualty counter on Henmo's Wake. Activate only as a sorcery.
